name: Punks Not Dead
description:
Game made during a course of initiation to Unity at the enjmin school. 

The Game

Have some fun in a large crowd surrounded by a pogo in which you'll have to fight to impose your respect, and to do so, score as much as possible by pushing people in the right timing, while enjoying a bit of punk on a big stage with a singer who does his show.

Controls

Space to push

K to get up

1 to shout (yeah)

Songs
  • Béruriers Noir - Vivre libre ou mourir
  • Tagada Jones - Mort aux cons
Next features
  • Headbangs to heal yourself
  • More songs
  • More SFX
  • Better UI
  • Xbox controller

Feel free to give me a feedback (french/english or whatever)

Enjoy!
